name: Fast track bicycle rider:The Jungle race Challenge
name_original: Fast track bicycle rider:The Jungle race Challenge
description:
The ultimate and xtreme bicycle riding experience is back with a bang! The extreme mountain bike, jungle and sports cycle challenge is out for the super bike fans and BMX daredevils in Fast track bicycle rider: The Jungle race Challenge. The sport cycle and extreme mountain bike riding will never be same again.
In Fast track bicycle rider: The Jungle race Challenge you bike riding skills will be tested on thrilling and life-threatening mountains, hills and jungle tracks. You need to be champion biker on every track to be crowned as an undisputed bicycle rider in the sport entertainment industry. The opponent cyclist are also well training and ready to face the challenge. So you have to perform beyond your reputation and training to beat these opponents. You also need to be careful of the wild animals wondering on these jungle tracks. This is not just a sports cycle race but the extreme bike race with dangerous animals and wild hunters!
So download this sport cycle extravaganza Fast track bicycle rider: The Jungle race Challenge and experience the extreme bike rider speed racing, extreme stunts and daredevil riding to the most difficult of the tracks. You think you know how to ride the bicycle? Think and again!
Game Features:
1) Incredible graphics and tracks
2) Challenging extreme bike races and levels
3) Easy bicycle ride controls and physics
